Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Alglenweis]{Alglenweis}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Gozreh]{Gozreh}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Hshurha]{Hshurha}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Kostchtchie]{Kostchtchie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pulura]{Pulura}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Uvuko]{Uvuko}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Yamatsumi]{Yamatsumi}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Winter Bolt]{Winter Bolt}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Diamond Dust]{Diamond Dust}

You control ice, snow, and freezing temperatures.
name: Cold Domain
